definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
(of a city etc) ablaze with lights

sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 聖誕樹放在燈火通明的客廳的一角，實在是太莢了。

sentences.english: Looked at the lights outside the car felt the first time found that all very strange.
sentences.chinese: 看着車外的燈火闌珊，第一次發覺所有很陌生。

sentences.english: The city was ablaze with light, and not a single air-raid alarm sounded .
sentences.chinese: 市內燈火輝煌，聽不到一聲空襲警報。

sentences.english: Lights, and Cup cross-video, mapping of the human reflection.
sentences.chinese: 燈火中，杯與光交影，映射着人與人之間的倒影。

sentences.english: These rooms would be lighted up every evening.
sentences.chinese: 客房裏的房間通宵達旦燈火通明。

sentences.english: The town was Li lights dim, some mixed contact is not clear.
sentences.chinese: 小鎮飄漓的燈火，朦朧得有些混觸不清。

sentences.english: The lights in the hall burned all night.
Trace of her thousands of Baidu, when I look back, that people in the lights at the Blue Coral.
sentences.chinese: 衆裏尋他千百度，驀然回首，那人卻在燈火藍珊處。

sentences.english: Street lighting was dimmed out during the war.
sentences.chinese: 戰時街道照明實行半燈火管制。

sentences.english: As evening falls, each family begins to put on their lights.
sentences.chinese: 初更時候，家家戶戶開始燃起燈火。

sentences.english: The French-held island of Corsica appears as a dark mass rimmed with light near the top of the frame.
sentences.chinese: 照片上方被燈火鑲邊的黑暗區域是法屬科西嘉島。

sentences.english: It is winter and Dhaka is full of lights.
sentences.chinese: 隆冬時節的達卡燈火通明。

sentences.english: The pier was lit up along its entire length.
sentences.chinese: 整個橋墩從頭到尾都沐浴在燈火之中。

sentences.english: The streets were not lighted at night during the blackout.
sentences.chinese: 燈火管制期間，夜晚街道沒有照明。

sentences.english: Summer is close. The blinking night neon lamps make people feel more empty and alone.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚閃燦的燈火讓人覺得特別空虛寂寞。

sentences.english: Anyhow, people laughing every glittering moaned, quite is lively.
sentences.chinese: 總之家家燈火輝煌，人們談笑風聲，頗是熱鬧。

definition: to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
red candle (used during birthdays and other celebrations)
(of a city etc) ablaze with lights
